data.text: @Deseret @dennisromboy Seems too low, even for Utah.
@Deseret @dennisromboy This might sound far-fetched. But the threat is real and the seditious group is none other than the Republican party. Its target is the 2024 presidential election

@Deseret @dennisromboy At hand is a plot to destroy American democracy from within. Its organizers have infiltrated the highest echelons of state and federal government, and have instigated and condoned acts of violence directed against our elected officials. This might sound far-fetched.
@Deseret @dennisromboy Donald Trump’s legacy, “the most terrible, horrific thing he has left us in America, is the destruction of truth… And a democracy can’t survive if  there is no truth.”

@Deseret @dennisromboy Pandemic Politics: Red state governors are in trouble for their Covid leadership

Elaine KamarckTuesday, October 19, 2021

@Deseret @dennisromboy The Corruption of the Republican Party

The GOP is best understood as an insurgency that carried the seeds of its own corruption from the start.

@Deseret @dennisromboy 2021
One year later, two-thirds of all Americans believe U.S. democracy is threatened, according to a CBS News poll. That crisis of trust is bigger than just one party — both Republican and Democratic voters have expressed doubt in the system.
@Deseret @dennisromboy Fifty-four percent of voters across 48 Republican-held congressional districts said Republicans are “more corrupt” than Democrats,

@Deseret @dennisromboy LDS church membership growth no longer outpaces the world population growth rate, which was around 1.05% in 2020, meaning the Church is growing slower than the earth's population is growing. Reports of rising membership have been called into question.
@Deseret @dennisromboy A slight majority of Utahns say President Trump is doing a good job — but approval dips on his immigration policy
